Package com.socialize

Interface Summary
SocializeLifecycleListener Allows clients to bind to socialize lifecycle events.
SocializeService The main Socialize Service.

Socialize Singleton helper class to make accessing the socialize service easier.
SocializeActionProxy Proxies all requests to top level Socialize interfaces to ensure that clients are both initialized and authenticated.
